template_input_params.name: allow_unverified_ssl
template_input_params.description: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate
template_input_params.label: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_name
template_input_params.description: A unique name for the network
template_input_params.label: Unique Network Name

template_input_params.name: vcd_edge_gateway
template_input_params.description: The name of the edge gateway
template_input_params.label: Edge Gateway Name

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_netmask
template_input_params.description: The netmask for the new network. Defaults to 255.255.255.0
template_input_params.label: Netmask

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_dns1
template_input_params.description: First DNS server to use. Defaults to 8.8.8.8
template_input_params.label: DNS Server 1

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_dns2
template_input_params.description: Second DNS server to use. Defaults to 8.8.4.4
template_input_params.label: DNS Server 2

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_dnssuffix
template_input_params.description: A FQDN for the virtual machines on this network
template_input_params.label: DNS Suffix

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_dhcp_pool
template_input_params.description: A range of IPs to issue to virtual machines that don't have a static IP
template_input_params.label: DHCP Pool

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_dhcp_start_address
template_input_params.description: The first address in the IP Range
template_input_params.label: DHCP Pool Start address

template_input_params.name: vcd_network_dhcp_end_address
template_input_params.description: The end address in the IP Range
template_input_params.label: DHCP Pool end address
